sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import styled from 'styled-components'
import Navbar from './Navbar'
import Hero from './Hero'
import Newsletter from './Newsletter'
import Footer from './Footer'


const Container = styled.div`

`

const Wrapper = styled.div`
    padding: 3rem;
    display: flex;
`

const ImgContainer = styled.div`
    flex: 1;
`

const Image = styled.img`
    width: 70%;
    margin-left: 6rem;
`

const InfoContainer = styled.div`
    flex: 1;
    padding: 0rem 3rem;
`

const Title = styled.h1`
    font-weight: 200;
`

const Desc = styled.p`
    margin: 1rem 0rem;
`

const Price = styled.span`
    font-weight: 100;
    font-size: 2.4rem;
`
const FilterContainer = styled.div`
    width: 50%;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
`

const Filter = styled.div``

const FilterTitle = styled.span`
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    font-weight: 200;
`

const FilterRarity = styled.select`
    width: 1.2rem;
    height: 1.2rem;
    border-radius: 50;
    margin: 0px 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
`

const FilterCondition = styled.select``

const FilterConditionOption = styled.option``




const IndividualProduct = () => {
  return (
    <Container>
    <Navbar/>
    <Hero/>
        <Wrapper>
            <ImgContainer>
                <Image src='/images/Baron.png'/>
            </ImgContainer>
            <InfoContainer>
                <Title>Baronne De Fleur</Title>
                <Desc>One of the best synchro monsters in the Yugioh TCG. It's good both going first and second because of its ability to destroy cards as well as provide omni-negation. It is also generic so you can play it any synchro deck that can reliably make level 10 monsters which will elevate the deck's ceiling and your overall win rate</Desc>
                <Price>$ 5</Price>            
            </InfoContainer>
            <FilterContainer>
                <Filter>
                    <FilterTitle>Rarity</FilterTitle>
                        <FilterRarity>Super rare</FilterRarity>         
                        <FilterRarity>Ultra Rare</FilterRarity>         
                        <FilterRarity>Secret Rare</FilterRarity>         
                        <FilterRarity>Ultimate Rare</FilterRarity>         
                </Filter>
                <Filter>
                    <FilterTitle>Condition</FilterTitle>
                    <FilterCondition></FilterCondition>
                        <FilterConditionOption>Near Mint</FilterConditionOption>
                        <FilterConditionOption>Lightly Played</FilterConditionOption>
                        <FilterConditionOption>Moderately Played</FilterConditionOption>
                        <FilterConditionOption>Damaged</FilterConditionOption>
                </Filter>
            </FilterContainer>
        </Wrapper>
    <Newsletter/>
    <Footer/>
    </Container>
  )
}

export default IndividualProduct
